CustomField.description: Select tasks requiring specialized PPE plus extra spaces for print format(This field was created for NPL MA).
CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES(Select_tasks_requiring_specialized_PPE__c, 'FR Clothing'), 'FR Clothing' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Select_tasks_requiring_specialized_PPE__c, 'Fall Protection'), 'Fall Protection' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Select_tasks_requiring_specialized_PPE__c, 'Respiratory Protection'), 'Respiratory Protection' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Select_tasks_requiring_specialized_PPE__c, 'Other'), 'Other', null)
CustomField.label: Tasks specialized PPE
